title: #324:  Bethenny Phones-A-Friend
description:
The epic season 8 of "Real Housewives of New York" continues with Reunion Part 1. We cover it all and then take a look at last week's "Real Housewives of Melbourne." Come listen!

00:04:50 - Crappens Mailbag!
00:12:58 - RHONY Reunion Part 1
01:23:41 - Real Housewives of Melbourne

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
